com.jdon.container.visitor.data
接口 SessionContextSetup

所有已知实现类：
HttpRequestUserSetup
public interface SessionContextSetup

load the informations about the login user, and save into sessioncontext that can be accessed in container. the default implementions is the HttpRequestUserSetup. HttpRequestUserSetup must be configured in container.xml so ,you can replace it.
